message: I flew one of these, compares to a single protected prop on a quad copter.  Would be cool to swarm these.  I think there was an issue with the steering.
This Quadcopter runs RobotOS, and the prot is maintained by a group at CCNY (City College of New York) http://www.ros.org/wiki/Robots/AscTec http://robotics.ccny.cuny.edu/blog/

I believe the problem with steering is that it's Up & Down. The rest is wind & torque. But it would be cool to hook multiples together, provided there are ways to have propellers that spin in opposite directions.
May also be cool to hook up a few EDFs together, make a science-fiction-looking hovering/flying machine.
